Qualifiers.applicability: Television and radio antennas mounted on buildings subject to daylight plane controls
ambiguities: Entry is listed under daylight plane protrusions but states allowance 'above maximum building height', creating a potential scope inconsistency (daylight plane vs. height limit). No figure provided.

Variables.name: antenna_protrusion_above_max_building_height
Variables.description: Vertical distance the antenna projects above the maximum building height allowed by zoning

Constants.name: max_allowed_protrusion_above_max_building_height
Constants.spec: Table: Allowable daylight plane protrusions summary

Qualifiers.applicability: Chimneys and flues with width less than 5 ft

Variables.name: feature_width
Variables.description: Maximum horizontal width of the chimney or flue

Variables.name: protrusion_beyond_daylight_plane
Variables.description: Amount the feature extends beyond the daylight plane

Variables.name: required_clearance_per_code
Variables.description: Minimum clearance required by Building Code Chapter 16.04 for the chimney/flue

Conditions.logic: If feature_width < 5 ft, protrusion_beyond_daylight_plane is permitted only to the minimum extent necessary to meet required_clearance_per_code

Qualifiers.applicability: Dormers, roof decks, gables, or similar architectural features
ambiguities: Text states 'height ≤ 24’'; unit and magnitude appear unusually large for a roof feature height and may be a transcription error.
Phrase 'on each side' for separation and cumulative length is ambiguous (could mean each side of the building, roof, or daylight plane).

Variables.name: individual_feature_length
Variables.description: Longitudinal length of each individual feature

Variables.name: cumulative_feature_length_per_side
Variables.description: Sum of lengths of all applicable features on the same side

Variables.name: separation_between_features_per_side
Variables.description: Clear horizontal distance between adjacent features on the same side

Variables.name: feature_height
Variables.description: Height of each feature (measurement datum not specified)

Constants.name: cumulative_length_limit_per_side
Constants.spec: Cumulative length of all features per side

Constants.name: minimum_separation_per_side
Constants.spec: Minimum separation between features on the same side

Constants.name: height_limit
Constants.spec: Height limit for each feature as transcribed

Conditions.notes: Height datum not specified; transcription indicates feet; verify source.

Relationships.logic: All four constraints (individual length, cumulative length per side, minimum separation per side, and height) must be simultaneously satisfied for each side evaluated independently.

Qualifiers.applicability: Cornices, eaves, and similar architectural features

Variables.name: protrusion_beyond_daylight_plane
Variables.description: Amount the feature extends beyond the daylight plane

Constants.name: max_protrusion_beyond_daylight_plane
Constants.spec: Maximum allowable protrusion for eligible features

Conditions.logic: Feature must not be a flat or continuous wall or an enclosure usable for interior space
